column1:
Speaking of a miscarriage of justice, you awarded the medal of freedom to Rush Limbaugh, a guy who says coronavirus is tantamount to “the common cold.”
Simpletons, the both of you.

I am tired of this simulation. I think Mother Nature is as well and Coronavirus is her last straw. 

Let's flip back to the Hillary Clinton presidency simulation where we are all happy and have health insurance and the world is safe and secure.
